summary: Adds the 4 Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles as companions
descriptionHtml:
Since I saw TMNT Armor by Higeyosi, I was filled with glee and nostalgia for the 1980s series that I had to watch it again.

I though \"kowabunga!\" and made this mod in honor of Higeyosi\'s efforts.

[img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/34927-1-1366223338.jpg[/img]

And for those who are also still playing Oblivion or planning on going back very soon, look at this:

Ninja Turtle Race by Corthian
http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/26680

These are basically 4 Argonian companions called 

- Leonardo
- Donatello
- Raphael
- Michalangelo

All these party dudes can be found in the Ragged Flagon in Riften as a starting point. 

Their stats are equivelent to thier onscreen counterparts but i will tweak, prod and upgrade next update.

Donatello\'s nose clips through the face mask of his so that will be fixed asap.. *FIXED*

I wanted each \"turtle\" to be similar as they are physically but slight differences to reflect thier personalities and lifestyles they lead e.g. Raphael is aggresive, quick to temper and dleves straight in whist Leonardo is the leader, acute, wise beyond his years, patient and understanding. Mikie justs wanna eat pizza and party.

Armor seperate and can be found here:

TMNT Armor by Higeyosi
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34903

Some Weapons can be found here:
Japanese Weapon Pack by malibu1039
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34080
author: Higeyosi for the armors and idea
